aboutHero.title: ABOUT US
aboutHero.description: At Feasto, we believe every meal should be an experience. From locally sourced ingredients to chef-crafted dishes, we bring people together through flavor, ambiance, and genuine hospitality. Whether you are here for a quick bite or a celebration, expect comfort, creativity, and unforgettable taste.

aboutContent.description: At Feasto, we specialize in delivering exceptional culinary experiences tailored to your tastes. With a focus on quality, creativity, and guest satisfaction, we create moments that inspire and endure.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To be a leading restaurant known for transforming meals into memories, delivering excellence, and creating a place that feels like home.

testimonials.title: What Our Guests Are Saying
testimonials.description: We don't just serve food — we create moments. Here is what our guests have to say about their experience at Feasto, from the flavors on their plate to the feeling they take home.

freshIngredients.title: Fresh Ingredients
freshIngredients.desc: We prioritize quality by using fresh, local ingredients in every dish.

guestSatisfaction.title: Guest Satisfaction
guestSatisfaction.desc: Every dish and every moment is crafted to exceed expectations.

culinaryInnovation.title: Culinary Innovation
culinaryInnovation.desc: We create unique flavor experiences blending tradition and creativity.

trustTransparency.title: Trust & Transparency
trustTransparency.desc: We believe in honest service and transparent communication.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Practices
sustainability.desc: Our kitchen follows eco-conscious methods and minimizes waste.

teamExcellence.title: Team Excellence
teamExcellence.desc: Our team is our soul — skilled, passionate, and dedicated to hospitality.
